description:
A Flux-based modification of the InfluxQL-based dashboard from https://grafana.com/grafana/dashboards/12625 - thank you, jenniferhatches.  Modifications pertain to layout (less emphasis on power consumption costs), colour thresholds for UPS Runtime, and the addition of power factor calculated based on maximum load/real power (watts) and maximum apparent power (volt-amps) supported by the UPS, as well as correct representation of the calculated load and total UPS consumption as a function of load percentage. You will need to manually alter the load power figures for the "maxwatt" variable, in accordance with APC's official specifications for your UPS unit(s). "maxvoltamp" variable will continue to automatically extract its value from the model name, as per the previous author's design.

Notes for Revision 2: Completely revamped the calculation for kWh graphs, which were so far away from accuracy I'm embarrassed I overlooked them when interpreting the code from InfluxQL to Flux. Correctly using integral function for gathering kWh consumption in both 24hr and 1M periods.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "apcupsd" and r.ups_name == "${upsname}")
  |> keep(columns: ["status"])
  |> group()
  |> distinct(column: "status")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "apcupsd" and r.ups_name == "${upsname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "load_percent")
  |> group()
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "apcupsd" and r.ups_name == "${upsname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "battery_charge_percent")
  |> group()
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "apcupsd" and r.ups_name == "${upsname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "time_left_ns")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "apcupsd" and r.ups_name == "${upsname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "time_on_battery_ns")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "apcupsd" and r.ups_name == "${upsname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "battery_voltage")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "apcupsd" and r.ups_name == "${upsname}" and r._field == "load_percent")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","_value"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: (r._value / 100.0) * float(v: ${maxwatt})}))
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "apcupsd" and r.ups_name == "${upsname}" and r._field == "load_percent")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","_value"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: (r._value / 100.0) * float(v: ${maxvoltamp})}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "apcupsd" and r.ups_name == "${upsname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "time_left_ns")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","_value","battery_charge_percent","upsname"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "apcupsd" and r.ups_name == "${upsname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "input_voltage")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","_value","input_voltage","upsname"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "apcupsd" and r.ups_name == "${upsname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "input_frequency")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "apcupsd" and r.ups_name == "${upsname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "input_voltage")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "apcupsd" and r.ups_name == "${upsname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "battery_charge_percent")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","_value","battery_charge_percent","upsname"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "apcupsd" and r.ups_name == "${upsname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "load_percent")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","_value","battery_charge_percent","upsname"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "apcupsd" and r.ups_name == "${upsname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "output_voltage")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "apcupsd" and r.ups_name == "${upsname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "internal_temp")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "apcupsd" and r.ups_name == "${upsname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "battery_voltage")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","_value","battery_voltage","upsname"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "apcupsd" and r.ups_name == "${upsname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "input_frequency")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","_value","input_frequency","upsname"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "apcupsd" and r.ups_name == "${upsname}" and r._field == "load_percent")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","_value","load_percent"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: ((r._value / 100.0) * float(v: ${maxvoltamp}) / 1000.0)}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "apcupsd" and r.ups_name == "${upsname}" and r._field == "load_percent")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","_value"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: ((r._value / 100.0) * float(v: ${maxvoltamp}) / 1000.0) * ${kwhprice}}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "apcupsd" and r.ups_name == "${upsname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "time_on_battery_ns")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","_value","time_on_battery_ns","upsname"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "apcupsd" and r.ups_name == "${upsname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "output_voltage")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","_value","output_voltage","upsname"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "apcupsd" and r.ups_name == "${upsname}" and r._field == "load_percent")
  |> aggregateWindow(
    every: 1h,
    fn: (tables=<-, column) =>
        tables
            |> integral(unit: 1h)
            |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: ((r._value / 100.0) * float(v: ${maxvoltamp}) / 1000.0)})))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","_value"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)

list.definition:
from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "apcupsd")
  |> keep(columns: ["ups_name"])
  |> group()
  |> distinct(column: "ups_name")
list.label: UPS Name
list.name: upsname
list.query:
from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "apcupsd")
  |> keep(columns: ["ups_name"])
  |> group()
  |> distinct(column: "ups_name")

list.definition:
from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "apcupsd" and r.ups_name == "${upsname}")
  |> keep(columns: ["model"])
  |> group()
  |> distinct(column: "model")
list.label: UPS Max Output Power Capacity (VA)
list.name: maxvoltamp
list.query:
from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "apcupsd" and r.ups_name == "${upsname}")
  |> keep(columns: ["model"])
  |> group()
  |> distinct(column: "model")

list.definition:
from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "apcupsd" and r.ups_name == "${upsname}" and r._field == "nominal_power")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","ups_name"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: if "${upsname}" == "UPSTower" then 800 else 980}))
  |> yield(name: "last")
list.label: UPS Max Output Power Capacity (W)
list.name: maxwatt
list.query:
from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "apcupsd" and r.ups_name == "${upsname}" and r._field == "nominal_power")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","ups_name"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: if "${upsname}" == "UPSTower" then 800 else 980}))
  |> yield(name: "last")

list.definition:
from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "apcupsd" and r.ups_name == "${upsname}")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","ups_name"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: if "${upsname}" == "UPSTower" then float(v: ${maxwatt})/float(v: ${maxvoltamp}) else float(v: ${maxwatt})/float(v: ${maxvoltamp})}))
  |> yield(name: "last")
list.label: Power Factor
list.name: powerfactor
list.query:
from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "apcupsd" and r.ups_name == "${upsname}")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","ups_name"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: if "${upsname}" == "UPSTower" then float(v: ${maxwatt})/float(v: ${maxvoltamp}) else float(v: ${maxwatt})/float(v: ${maxvoltamp})}))
  |> yield(name: "last")

title: APC UPS Detailed Summary
